name: live-chat-app
description:
A Real-Time Chat that allows users to join chat rooms and communicate with each other instantly.
built using Node.js & Socket.IO & React, and Styled-Components.

scripts.build:client: npm run install:client && cd client && npm run build && mkdir -p ../server/public && cp -r build/* ../server/public
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
